reviews.text:
Rude seller. Fruits can be potentially cheaper than supermarkets like fairprice but it's not worth the effort.

Bought mandarin oranges today and the experience wasn't good when I was told off by the staff for removing stems of the oranges. No signage to say you can't remove the stems and mind you these oranges come with like long stems and  leaves which wld probably make a hole in the carrier bag. I don't understand why the staff can be bothered to prep the fruits before Sale and they expect the customer to be for orange stem and leaves together with the oranges.

Year 2018, Initially last week saw MSW pahang selling $15 per kg. Now up to $18 per kg. ü§î However, There is this guy wear spec plump sale guy ü§ì whom very friendly with good service whom help to chose some of the durians. Butter ones and Mixed durians (3 for $20). Been support this stall since few years ago.
At times even the 1 for $5 durian also not bad. üòêTake note if weather rainy seasons, last weekend i bought 4 or more, a few ones is watery and 1 one of 6 husk have no tastes.. Should have checked properly before left.

This stall sometimes sell fruits at more reasonable price. Hope they can have offers for some of the fruits weekly. Today they are having offer on Thai's coconut. üëç. Looking forward to them having better service and honest in selling durians.

Stop buying from this stall. It's 2024, start telling your families and friends to check Google reviews before patronizing any store. They have multiple horrible reviews and it shows that this shop is a TOTAL SCAM. Their durians are actually rotten and I'm not kidding when I say I saw maggots in the durian LOL speechless to say

Prices are not consistent. Monday bought at $9 per kg, $19 for 2 durians, Saturday bought at $11 per kg, $37 hot 2 durians

Check carefully before buying.so that it is within your budget.
